articles.description: Former United star Dimitar Berbatov has been talking about Martial and what he can learn from team-mate Edinson Cavani
articles.content:
Anthony Martial needs to "up his game" for Manchester United, according to Dimitar Berbatov.
Martial has only managed two goals so far this season and is yet to get off the mark in the Premier Leagu… [+2709 chars]

articles.author: Paul Gorst
articles.title: Virgil van Dijk returns to Liverpool training centre as recovery continues - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Van Dijk underwent surgery at the end of October but is now back in the gym at the club's AXA Training Centre
articles.content:
Virgil van Dijk is back in Liverpool training less than five weeks after undergoing knee surgery.
The Reds centre-back suffered damage to his anterior cruciate ligament following a reckless tackle f… [+1900 chars]
